step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance.
Great job stretching your arm overhead. Remember to keep it straight as you prepare to open your hand.
Excellent! Open your palm and fingers wide, ready for the exhale and relaxation phase.
Well done! Make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Visualize the fluid moving.
Second rep, looking good! Maintain that straight arm overhead and feel the stretch.
Nicely done keeping the arm overhead. Focus on opening your hand wide for the next step.
Perfect! Open your hand and fingers wide, preparing to inhale and make a fist.
Fantastic! You're making a fist while inhaling and tightening. Keep up the great work visualizing the lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Make sure to open your hand wide and then make a fist while inhaling, visualizing the fluid moving.
